root.name: Dogs of War
root.description: OverviewIn Dogs of War you are a freelance mercenary who can take on a range of missions. The missions include include rescuing kidnapped children, preventing terrorists from overthrowing a Government, and retrieving stolen oil paintings. The amount of money on offer for each mission depends on its difficulty.Before each mission you are able to buy weapons including pistols, machine guns, grenade launchers, anti-tank weapons etc etc.
